scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && npm run clean:root
scripts.publish:major: npm run publish:major --workspaces && npm run publish:tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm run publish:minor --workspaces && npm run publish:tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm run publish:patch --workspaces && npm run publish:tags
scripts.publish:tags: git push --tags && git push origin HEAD
